name: percale
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of smooth material made of cotton, or mainly of cotton, used especially for making bed sheets, etc.: Smooth cotton percale is cool and absorbent and washes well. a percale pillowcase
More examplesFewer examplesThe bed linen is combed cotton percale with a high 200-thread count.In luxury percale, a double duvet cover costs around £47.99.Our three children are sleeping in the very same percale sheets I had as a child.
